title: [Dynamic Regions] TiKV restart fails "failed to get region state"
body:
## Bug Report

TiKV restart fails with following log.

```log
[2023/05/11 23:40:00.740 +08:00] [FATAL] [server2.rs:817] ["failed to start node: Other(\"[components/raftstore-v2/src/operation/ready/apply_trace.rs:387]: failed to get region state for region 206022: Ok(None)\")"]
```

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

53bc41d089f31f348639450add08ac1ec8f61241 in PR #14708 

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

Unknown.

### What did you expect?

Restart successfully.

### What did happened?

Fails to restart.

[tikvlog.tar.gz](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/files/11486767/tikvlog.tar.gz)
